WorkItem.Description:
I lost __considerable__ time on the following error when loading module from app.config:

![Image](http://www.global-webnet.net/blog/image.axd?picture=002-LoaderExceptions.png)

After making a minor update to the ModuleManager I was able to fix the issue within a few minutes:

![Image](http://www.global-webnet.net/blog/image.axd?picture=006-final.png)

The problem was a simple mistake in which my module was pointing to Prism assemblies versus the Prism Source code (which I had to insert to resolve [issue #14619](https://mef.codeplex.com/workitem/14619))

![Image](http://www.global-webnet.net/blog/image.axd?picture=001-ScreenShots.png)
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to load one or more of the requested types...
